alert.note: Alert for Brown; Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 29 at 7:26PM CDT until June 29 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR ROCK...EASTERN BROWN AND KEYA PAHA COUNTIES... At 726 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Wewela to near Long Pine to 12 miles south of Ainsworth, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bassett, Springview, Long Pine, Newport, Burton, Hofeld Lake, Nets Peak, Raven, Sybrant, Mariaville, Pony Lake, Pine Glen State Wildlife Refuge, Jones Lake, Mills, Brocksburg and Johnsons Corner. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 159 and 225. Highway 20 between mile markers 244 and 273. Highway 12 between mile markers 49 and 85. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
